name: SpaceWar (itch) (Arrwa)
description:
Hey Everyone !

Can't believe i just finished my first 2D shooter game!!!! 

I introduce to you my SpaceWar Game.
The Main Modifications I've made are:

  1. Added Chasers.
  2. Added New Graphics for each level.
  3. Added New Audio To Each Level.
  4. Reduced The Health To Some Enemies.

I truly hope you enjoy the game , if you face any problems please type it in the comments !

Regard

Arwa Alfuraih
